slideshow.title: SeeYou - makes You a better pilot
slideshow.subtitle:
Designed for pilots by pilots, to simplify the process of learning cross country and competition flying skills, that an exceptional pilot needs. 

<TrialBtn />

slideshow.title: SeeYou - easy flight planning
slideshow.subtitle:
Click away on the map to create a perfect task for your next flight, supported by integrated weather forecast from TopMeteo and Skysight. 

<TrialBtn />

slideshow.title: SeeYou - every map you need
slideshow.subtitle:
Depending on where you fly and what you want to analyze you can choose between outdoor, terrain and satellite maps.

<TrialBtn />

slideshow.title: SeeYou - stunning 3D views
slideshow.subtitle: Replay your flight in the 3D view mode and wow your friends.

sections.title: SeeYou - makes you a better pilot.
sections.body:
Plan, execute and analyze your soaring flights. 

<TrialBtn />
